input.sentences: today we went to a heroes convention . there were lots of booths and work shops .
we decided to visit one of the larger comic vendor booths.there were so many different comics .
we met one really famous person.i was so excited he signed my tummy .
there were some really funny signs.and some that other people thought were funny | but i did not get .
we listened to a panel discuss some of there upcoming events and presentations . they talked along time .
output.sentences: John wasn't thrilled when his wife asked him to go to a Heroes Convention.
They spent and hour looking at all the hero ticky-tack and souvenirs.
His wife insisted he buy something so he finally allowed the  man in the plaid shirt to sell him a t-shirt.
Then he spotted the sign in the corner and thought it described his feelings to a T.
But at the end of the day, when the panel gave him the Hero of the Day award his wife was vindicated and he took her out for a very nice dinner.
